welcome_message_body: Welcome to Zapopan, where tradition meets modernity in a charming blend of historic architecture, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

airports.airport_name: Don Miguel Hidalgo y Costilla International

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Don Miguel Hidalgo y Costilla International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Don Miguel Hidalgo y Costilla International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
